doc:
Leonard Trolley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leonard_Trolley 0 Leonard Trolley (January 1, 1918 – February 10, 2005) was an English actor, who is best known for playing Arthur Forrest in A Family Secret of the sixth episode of the third series of the British television series, Upstairs, Downstairs.He is also known for The Message, Rise and Fall of Idi Amin, A Countess from Hong Kong, Bergerac, The Mayor of Casterbridge, The Stud, Consuming Passions, In the Shadow of Kilimanjaro, Champions, Doctor Who (in the serial The Faceless Ones), Prelude to Fame and Z-Cars. Leonard_Trolley ( January_1_,_1918 – February_10_,_2005 ) was an_English_actor , who is_best_known for playing Arthur_Forrest in A_Family_Secret of the_sixth_episode of the_third_series of the_British_television_series , Upstairs , Downstairs.He is_also_known for The_Message_,_Rise_and_Fall of Idi_Amin , A_Countess from Hong_Kong , Bergerac , The_Mayor of Casterbridge , The_Stud_,_Consuming_Passions , In the_Shadow of Kilimanjaro , Champions , Doctor Who ( in the_serial The_Faceless_Ones ) , Prelude to Fame_and_Z-Cars .
